price: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da ya ga rãnã tanã bayyana, ya ce: "Wannan shĩ ne Ubangijina, wannan ne mafi girma?" Sa'an nan a lõkacin da ta fãɗi, ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Lalle ne ni barrantacce nake daga abin da kuke yi na shirki."
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ بَازِغَةٗ قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّي هَٰذَآ أَكۡبَرُۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَتۡ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
